name: Water Hazard
description:
This game was originally created for Ludum Dare 29.

Enhanced version eliminates nasty bugs and adds content.
===============================================

Water Hazard is inspired from old school survival horror games from 90's like Resident Evil, Alone in the Dark and Dino Crisis.

90's Features:
- Tank controls
- Static cameras
- Low res/color textures with perspective errors
- No texture filtering
- Low poly models with vertex rounding errors

Our unique features:
- Oculus Rift support
- You can rotate camera angles manually

===============================================

Controls:
WASD - Move
E - Use / Shoot
SPACE - Ready gun
SHIFT - Run
MOUSE - Rotate view

Additional Controls:
XBOX Controller
F1 - Toggle PS1 Shaders
F12 - Reset Game

Enjoy pixels, texture warping and clunky controls!
